description:
I have polls in my stories today which led to me having SO many big conversations here.

I’m going to ask one more question of you today.... I’ve been wondering:
Have the current events had you looking at things differently and questioning more?
Are you even questioning things, maybe not, maybe just going with the flow?
If you are looking at this saying, this isn’t right,have you always been this way, asking questions and challenging the narrative?
———

The shirt: it’s from Target... I went on a spending freeze, other than necessities, at the beginning of all this (I do this sometimes) but when looking online for shoes for one of my girls, I found the T and thought it basically had my name on it. When it came, I quickly grabbed it before my strong willed one could read the quote and told her it said “never question your mother!” 🤣

Happy Friday guys... thanks for voting in the polls.. and answering all my questions, it’s the weekend! Let’s be happy and find some joy!
